IV.i.3.C.1.h
.
Handling Non-VA Hospital Reports That Are Insufficient for Rating Purposes
Request clarification of any hospital report that is insufficient for rating purposes and is received from a
State hospital
county hospital
municipal hospital
contract hospital, or
private hospital.
Important
:Â  Authorize a VA examination if a satisfactory corrected report cannot be obtained within a reasonable period of time.
title: M21-1, Part IV, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section C - Insufficient Examinations
citation: Part IV, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section C
